name: Strategic Solutions NW
description:
Strategic Solutions NW is a small group of technology and management consultants with many years of experience from global firms such as Accenture. We focus the skills acquired in our average 10 years of consultancy on exploring and applying technology solutions that improve business functions for our clients.
We pride ourselves on establishing a strong relationship with each client and working closely with them to identify inefficiencies and guide them in the transition to an ideal future state and beyond.
Having worked together for several years, our collective capability is what makes us most unique and what has allowed us to solve significant problems for our clientele. We believe in the power of teamwork and encourage collaboration amongst our team members to deliver the best solutions possible. While we specialize in Microsoft Dynamics 365 enterprise solutions, our solutions have been as diverse as our clients, from doing full cycle systems implementation to creating and operating an accounting center for a $450M business.
We encourage you to browse through our site and invite you to contact us to learn more about working with our team to help your business realize its full potential.
